blankStep.name: 1_introduction_to_the_get_started_tab
blankStep.text:
Introduction to the Get Started tab

The Get Started tab is the first step in the On-Screen Data Entry process. This is where you will enter the Manufacturer Part Number and Name, as well as indicate whether you are offering a Product or Accessory. The information you enter here will be automatically transferred to subsequent tabs.

blankStep.name: 2_filling_out_the_first_row
blankStep.text:
Filling out the first row.

For this lesson, you are going to fill out the first row of the Get Started tab.

inputStep.name: 3_type_a_manufacturer_part_number
inputStep.text:
Type a Manufacturer Part Number.

Example: HSC0424PP

This field should be entered exactly as provided by the manufacturer, and should not be edited in any way. You can enter up to 40 characters. Type in a Manufacturer Part Number below and hit Enter.
inputStep.errorAlert: ERROR: There is a 40 character limit and only alphanumeric characters are allowed.

inputStep.name: 4_type_a_manufacturer_part_name
inputStep.text:
Type a Manufacturer Part Name.

Example: Honeywell, or Samsung, or DeWalt

The manufacturer name is the name of the original manufacturer of the product. Enter a name, with a maximum of 40 characters, into the cell below and hit Enter.
inputStep.errorAlert: ERROR: There is a 40 character limit and only alphanumeric characters are allowed.

buttonStep.name: 5_open_the_drop-down_menu
buttonStep.text:
Open the drop-down menu.

Click in the text box to reveal the drop-down menu.

buttonStep.name: 6_select_the_product_type
buttonStep.text:
Select the Product Type.

For this lesson, select Product

buttonStep.name: 7_save_after_completing_each_row
buttonStep.text:
Save after completing each row.

Click the Save Products button frequently while filling out this tab. If you do not save your work, it will be lost.

buttonStep.name: 8_confirm_saved_products
buttonStep.text:
Confirm saved products.

When the Product Confirmation pop-up message appears, click OK.

blankStep.name: 9_filling_out_multiple_rows
blankStep.text:
Filling out multiple rows

For this lesson, we have filled out the remaining rows for you

buttonStep.name: 10_save_your_work
buttonStep.text:
Save your work.

Before moving onto the next tab, you must click the Save Products button. If you click off of this tab before saving, all of your information will be lost.

buttonStep.name: 11_confirm_saved_products
buttonStep.text:
Confirm saved products.

When the Product Confirmation pop-up message appears, click OK

testStep.name: 12_test_your_knowledge
testStep.text:
Test Your Knowledge

If you click onto the next tab without saving your information first, your data will be lost.
Select an answer in the window below.

blankStep.name: 13_end_of_get_started_tab_lesson
blankStep.text:
End of Get Started tab lesson.

Once you have completed the Get Started tab and saved your information, you will be able to move on to the General tab to continue.

Click Done to complete this lesson.

blankStep.name: 1_introduction_to_wizard_management
blankStep.text:
Introduction to Wizard Management.

The Wizard Management section is the first step to building out your pricing structure. This step is integral to the rest of your offer because each selection you make here will appear on the left-hand panel of your screen, and/or as a separate tab in your Capture Pricing table later on.

blankStep.name: 2_adding a discount to your offer
blankStep.text:
Adding a Discount to your offer.

A discount is the percentage by which the offer price will be reduced. If you are offering a discount on your product or accessory, you will need to specify if your discount applies at the offer, SIN, or line item level.

buttonStep.name: 3_open the discounts drop-down menu
buttonStep.text:
Open the Discounts drop-down menu.

Click on the down-facing arrow in the Discounts row to reveal the drop-down menu.

buttonStep.name: 4_select_yes
buttonStep.text:
Select Yes.

For this lesson, click Yes from the drop-down.

buttonStep.name: 5_choose_your_discount_level
buttonStep.text:
Choose your Discount level.

You will need to choose whether the discount(s) is offered at the offer, SIN, or line item level. For this lesson, click the radio button next to Offer Level.

blankStep.name: 6_adding_delivery_to_your_offer
blankStep.text:
Adding Delivery to your offer.

If you select Yes to the Delivery feature, you will specify the delivery type for the location(s) that applies to your offer on a later screen. The delivery types you can choose from are: FOB Destination, FOB Origin, FOB Worldwide, and No Delivery.

buttonStep.name: 7_open_the_delivery_drop-down_menu
buttonStep.text:
Open the Delivery drop-down menu.

Click on the down-facing arrow in the Delivery row to reveal the drop-down menu.

buttonStep.name: 8_select_yes
buttonStep.text:
Select Yes.

For this lesson, select Yes from the drop-down.

blankStep.name: 9_choose_your_delivery_level
blankStep.text:
Choose your Delivery level.

You will need to select the level at which your delivery option(s) applies. For this lesson, click the radio button next to SIN Level.

blankStep.name: 10_understanding_your_selections
blankStep.text:
Understanding your selections.

To help you understand which selections in Wizard Management apply to your offer, we will now provide you with the definition for each term. For instructional purposes, we will select Yes for each option on this screen.

blankStep.name: 11_contractor_warranty
blankStep.text:
Contractor Warranty

The Contractor Warranty is the warranty your company offers in addition to the manufacturer's warranty. It can be established at the SIN level only and will be applied to all products under that SIN.

blankStep.name: 12_zonal_pricing
blankStep.text:
Zonal Pricing

If your pricing for a particular product differs based on location, you should select Yes from this drop-down. In this section, you will set up your zone categories for each contiguous (CONUS) and non-contiguous (NON-CONUS) state. You will indicate actual pricing later in a separate section.

blankStep.name: 13_special_charges
blankStep.text:
Special Charges

This field is used to indicate additional charges for different delivery options. Special Charges include, but are not limited to: One Day Service, Inside Delivery, Assembly, and Installation.

blankStep.name: 14_special_features
blankStep.text:
Special Features.

This section is divided into two categories: Environmental Features and Special Features.

blankStep.name: 15_accessories
blankStep.text:
Accessories

Example: A computer mouse.
Accessories are items that must be associated with a product, but can also be sold separately. Accessories will show up in your final template, but not in the left-hand navigational menu.

blankStep.name: 16_options
blankStep.text:
Options

An option is a configurable element of a product, or a feature that may be chosen as an addition to, or replacement for, standard equipment and features. Examples of options include but are not limited to: color, size, and fabric type.

blankStep.name: 17_photos
blankStep.text:
Photos

Selecting Yes to this field indicates that you have additional photographs of the product you are selling. This selection will appear in your Capture Pricing template later on. You will then upload the additional photographs via the separate Upload Photo interface.

buttonStep.name: 18_save_your_selections
buttonStep.text:
Save your selections.

You must save your work before moving on to a new section; otherwise, your information will be lost. Click the Save button.

blankStep.name: 19_your_left-hand_menu_has_changed
blankStep.text:
Your left-hand menu has changed.

Before you completed Wizard Management, your left-hand navigational menu looked something like this.

blankStep.name: 20_your_left-hand_menu_has_changed
blankStep.text:
Your left-hand menu has changed.

Once you have saved your information, you will notice that many of your selections now appear in the left-hand navigational menu, and will require separate completion.

testStep.name: 21_test_your_knowledge
testStep.text:
Test Your Knowledge

You must complete the Wizard Management section before your pricing template can be completed.

Select an answer in the window below.

blankStep.name: 22_end_of_wizard_management_lesson
blankStep.text:
End of Wizard Management lesson.

Once you have completed the Wizard Management section, you will be able to move on to Special Charges.

Click Done to complete this lesson.

blankStep.name: 1_introduction_to_the_special_charges_section
blankStep.text:
Introduction to the Special Charges section.

The Special Charges section is where you will specify which charge(s) applies to your offer, included but not limited to: charges for delivery, assembly, training, and installation.

buttonStep.name: 2_open_the_sin_drop-down_menu
buttonStep.text:
Open the SIN drop-down menu.

Before you select your charge(s), you will need to indicate under which SIN they apply. Click on the down-facing arrow in the SIN/NSN row to reveal the drop-down menu.

buttonStep.name: 3_select_your_sin
buttonStep.text:
Select your SIN.

For this lesson, select 341 500.

buttonStep.name: 4_click_the_select_button
buttonStep.text:
Click the Select button.

Click the Select button to save your SIN selection.

buttonStep.name: 5_uncheck_the_none_box
buttonStep.text:
Uncheck the None box.

The None checkbox will already be selected when you begin. You will need to uncheck it before making any further selections. Un-select the None radio button by clicking on the check mark.

buttonStep.name: 6_choose_your_special_charges
buttonStep.text:
Choose your special charges.

You will be able to select as many charges as apply to your offer. For this lesson, only click on the Two Day Service checkbox.

buttonStep.name: 7_save_your_work
buttonStep.text:
Save your work.

Click on the Save button.

blankStep.name: 8_check_the_special_charges_table
blankStep.text:
Check the Special Charges table.

You will see your choice has been added to the table below.

blankStep.name: 9_add_another_sin
blankStep.text:
Add another SIN.

If you have multiple SINs that require Special Charges, you will need to repeat the same steps from the beginning and make the applicable selections. The Special Charges for each SIN will be displayed as separate rows in the table.

For this lesson, we have chosen a new SIN and special charge for you. Click Next.

buttonStep.name: 10_edit_a_special_charge
buttonStep.text:
Edit a Special Charge.

To add or delete a Special Charge from the table, click on the pencil icon in the Action column. For this lesson, click the pencil icon in the row for SIN 341 500.

buttonStep.name: 11_delete_a_special_charge
buttonStep.text:
Delete a Special Charge.

Click on the check box next to Two-Day Service to unselect it.

buttonStep.name: 12_add_a_special_charge
buttonStep.text:
Add a Special Charge.

Click on the box next to Expedite Premium.

buttonStep.name: 13_save_your_work
buttonStep.text:
Save your work.

Click the Save button.

blankStep.name: 14_end_of_special_charges_lesson
blankStep.text:
End of Special Charges lesson.

Once you have completed the Special Charges section, you will be able to move on to the Special Features section.

Click Done to complete this lesson.
